covata.rovers

Class Rover

  • java.lang.Object
    • covata.rovers.Rover

  • public class Rover
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a definition of a rover as a position Position and a direction (Direction).
    Author:
    ceven

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Rover(Position initialPos, Direction initialDir)
      Create a new rover with an initial position and direction

    • Method Detail

      • executeInstructions

        public void executeInstructions(java.util.List<Move> moves,
                                Position urCorner)
        Move this rover according to the sequence of instructions provided. Ensure that the rover does not exit the grid.
        Parameters:
        moves - a list of Move to perform by this Rover
        urCorner - the Position of the upper right corner of the grid where the rover evolves

        Make this rover move forward (update its position)

      • toSimpleString

        public java.lang.String toSimpleString()
        Returns:
        a string representing the position and the direction of the rover, separated by a blank space
